entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries south of Plum Point late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy south of Plum Point with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
